sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
    light: {
        colors: {
            globalBgColor: 'white',
            btnTextColor: 'white',
            btnBgColor: '#1976d2',
            btnBorderColor: '#1976d2',
            hoverBtnColor: 'white',
            hoverBtnBgColor: '#1565c0',
            containerBorderColor: 'black',
            containerBgColor: 'transparent',
            counterColor: 'blue',
            reverseBtnBorderColor: '#1565c0',
            reverseBtnBgColor: 'white',
            placeHolderText: 'blue',
            mainText: 'black',
        },
        id: 'light',
    },

    dark: {
        colors: {
            globalBgColor: 'black',
            btnTextColor: '#FFF',
            btnBgColor: 'purple',
            btnBorderColor: '#FFF',
            hoverBtnColor: '#FFF',
            hoverBtnBgColor: '#a657f2',
            containerBorderColor: 'white',
            containerBgColor: 'transparent',
            counterColor: '#fff',
            reverseBtnBgColor: 'purple',
            reverseBtnBorderColor: '#a657f2',
            placeHolderText: '#a657f2',
            mainText: 'white',
        },
        id: 'dark',
    },
};
